welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Pedro Atocpan, Mexico! Known for its charming streets, delicious cuisine, and vibrant culture, we are excited to have you here. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the beauty our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mariano Matamoros Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
